Hi, is there any web browser than other than firefox but as powerful as firefox?
why not just use firefox. It's as powerful as firefox, guaranteed...
you can open two firefox instances simultaneously if you want to. Use the profile manager and the no-remote options.
if i open two firefox at a time but is it possible then to open two different yahoo mail id on that two firefox instance?
if you use two different profiles, the two firefoxes will be completely independent. Simpler to open one firefox and one opera though...
which suggestion? And doesn't work how?
you are a master of brevity...

when i open 1st firefox then i open 2nd instance. then on 2nd instance i have to sing out first account then sign in again for new account but after doing this when i go back to 1st instace then there is also new account is logged in and it ask password
that's because you aren't using different profiles. Use one opera and one firefox. It will be much easier....
